title: C.U.P.: Confidence Under Pressure // Fun Month // Robert Madu
description: It’s Fun Month at TC! This week’s special guest is the lead pastor of Social Dallas, Robert Madu! He’s been sharing the Gospel around the world for 20 years with wife Taylor and their family. Check out this message as Pastor Robert teaches us what it looks like to have confidence in the Lord in the midst of pressure. If this message has encouraged you, let us know in the comment and share with a friend!
